Module oop.hunt.part2
Package oop.hunt.part2

Class Spot

java.lang.Object
oop.hunt.part2.Thingamajig
oop.hunt.part2.Spot
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hideout, Path, Plant, Water
public class Spot extends Thingamajig
The Spot class that is the parent class for all spots and contains their values and synchronization

  • Constructor Details

    • Spot

      public Spot(int x, int y, String name, int max_animals)
      Constructor for Spot class
      Parameters:
      x - starting x coordinate
      y - starting y coordinate
      name - name of the spot
      max_animals - max number of animals the spot can hold

  • Method Details

    • join

      public boolean join()
      Join method for thread-safe adding an animal to the spot
      Returns:
      true if the animal can join the spot, false otherwise

    • leave

      public boolean leave()
      Leave method for thread-safe removing an animal from the spot
      Returns:
      true if the animal can leave the spot, false otherwise

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:
      name

    • isAtCapacity

      public boolean isAtCapacity()
      check if the spot is at capacity
      Returns:
      true if the spot is at capacity, false otherwise
